name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with Indian spices

name: Sushi
description: Fish and rice rolls with various fillings like avocado, cucumber, or tuna

name: Caesar Salad
description: Lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing

name: Hamburger
description: Beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments in a bun

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, shrimp, peanuts, egg, and bean sprouts

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves

name: Beef Burrito
description: Tortilla filled with seasoned beef, rice, beans, cheese, and salsa

name: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat (usually beef or chicken)

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese
